name: Teacher Training Report
query:
select 
    `tabTeacher Training`.name_of_the_teacher as "Name of Trainer:Data/Name of Trainer",
    `tabTeacher Training`.school_name as "School Name:Data/School Name",
    `tabTeacher Training`.district as "District:Data/District",
    `tabTeacher Training`.total_teacher_to_be_trained as "Total teacher to be trained:Int/Total teacher to be trained",
    `tabTeacher Training`.training_days as "Training Days:Int/Training Days",
    `tabTeacher Training`.per_session_hours as "Per session (Hours):Data/Per session (Hours)",
    `tabTeacher Training`.date as "From Date:Datetime/From Date",
    `tabTeacher Training`.end_date as "End date:Datetime/End date",
    `tabTeacher Training`.venue as "Venue:Select/Venue",
    `tabTeacher Training`.training_on as "Training Topic:Small Text/Training Topic",
    `tabTeacher Training`.teacher_group_name as "Teacher Group Name:Data/Teacher Group Name"
from `tabTeacher Training`;
